## hpr3989 :: LastPass Security Update 1 November 2023

 In 2022, LastPass disclosed that it had been hacked, and I think by
now just about everyone has heard about it. Now we have evidence that
password vaults have been hacked. So what does this mean, and what
should you do?
Links:

https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/09/experts-fear-crooks-are-cracking-keys-stolen-in-lastpass-breach/
https://www.zwilnik.com/security-and-privacy/lastpass-hacked-what-does-this-mean/
https://wtop.com/tech/2023/01/data-doctors-should-i-stop-using-lastpass-for-password-management/
http://hackerpublicradio.org/eps.php?id=1810
